title: HoP 276 - Back to the Future - Foreknowledge and Predestination
itunes:title: HoP 276 - Back to the Future - Foreknowledge and Predestination
description: Scotus, Ockham, and Bradwardine ask how we can be free if God knows and chooses the things we will do in the future.
